Title: AN ACT AUTHORIZING PAYMENT FOR THE CARRIAGE OF MAILS BY AIRPLANES OUT OF THE REVENUE DERIVED FROM ADDITIONAL POSTAGE TO BE COLLECTED ON AIR MAILS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

[ Act No. 3869, November 13, 1931 ]
AN ACT AUTHORIZING PAYMENT FOR THE CARRIAGE OF MAILS BY AIRPLANES OUT OF THE REVENUE DERIVED FROM ADDITIONAL POSTAGE TO BE COLLECTED ON AIR MAILS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The Director of Posts is hereby authorized, with the approval of the Department Head, to use the whole of the revenue, or such portion thereof as may be necessary, derived from the additional postage to be collected on air mail, for the payment of services of mail contractors that may be employed to transport mails by airplanes in accordance with the provisions of section nineteen hundred and seventy-six of Act Numbered Twenty-seven hundred and eleven, as amended by section two of Act Numbered Thirty-eight hundred and six, and for all other expenditures incident to such air mail service.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, November 13, 1931.
